TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GiveFeedbackEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 事件提供数据，该事件在拖动操作期间发生。

span.span: Provides data for the event, which occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖动操作过程中发生 事件。The event occurs during a drag operation. 它允许拖动事件的源修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为用户提供视觉反馈。It allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 对象指定拖放操作的类型以及是否使用默认游标。A object specifies the type of drag-and-drop operation and whether default cursors are used. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取显示的拖放操作反馈。

span.span: Gets the drag-and-drop operation feedback that is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置拖动操作是否应使用与拖放效果关联的默认光标。

span.span: Gets or sets whether drag operation should use the default cursors that are associated with drag-drop effects.

value.span: 如果使用默认指针，值为 ；否则值为 。

span.span: if the default pointers are used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系统为不同的拖放操作（如移动或复制）提供了默认的拖放光标。The system provides default drag-drop cursors for different drag-drop operations such as move or copy. 如果 设置为 `false`，则事件源负责设置相应的游标。If is set to `false`, it is the responsibility of the event source to set the appropriate cursor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个 控件之间的拖放操作。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例在拖动操作开始时调用 方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标在 事件期间从鼠标位置移动了超出 ，则拖动操作将启动。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定 `MouseDown` 事件期间要拖动的项的索引。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示了如何对拖放操作使用自定义光标。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定应用程序目录中有两个 cursor 文件（`3dwarro.cur` 和 `3dwno.cur`，分别用于自定义的拖放和无删除光标。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果选中 `UseCustomCursorsCheck`，则将使用自定义光标。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义游标是在 事件处理程序中设置的。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态在右侧 `ListBox`的 事件处理程序中进行计算，以根据 SHIFT、CTRL、ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态确定拖动操作的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 在 `DragOver` 事件期间，也确定了放置的 `ListBox` 位置。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是 `String`，则将 设置为 ""。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，drop 的状态显示在 `DropLocationLabel`中。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 向右 `ListBox` 放置的数据是在 事件处理程序中确定的，`String` 值将添加到 `ListBox`中的适当位置。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果拖动操作移到窗体的边界之外，则会在 事件处理程序中取消拖放操作。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码摘录演示了如何使用 类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅 方法。See the method for the complete code example.
